title: T222- Why Settle For Less Than The Best In The World?
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T222- Why Settle For Less Than The Best In The World?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


Exceptional opportunity for the most discriminating of
collectors to obtain the only T222 Fatima card to ever
achieve the distinguished grade of PSA7.

Private bids accepted. Please be serious with the funds to secure this
rare and treasured best ever example extant.

Scans available to those willing to commit to our minimum bid requirements.
Trade offers for ultra high grade rare type cards will be considered.

Please forward your inquiries in confidence to bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com.

Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List

posts.post_title: T222- Why Settle For Less Than The Best In The World?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


We have already received two cash offers.

Bidding will end at midnight EST on August 12, 2008

Trade offers encouraged.

bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
